00039 #ifndef TIMER_H_
00040 #define TIMER_H_
00041 
00042 #if defined ( WIN32 )
00043 #include <windows.h>
00044 #else
00045 #include <sys/time.h>
00046 #endif
00047 
00048 class Timer
00049 {
00050 public:
00051         Timer();
00052         ~Timer();
00053 
00054         void Start();
00055     void Stop();
00056     void Reset();
00057     double Time();
00058 private:
00059     // Private Timer Data
00060     double m_time0, m_elapsed;
00061     bool m_running;
00062     double GetTime();
00063 
00064     #if defined( WIN32 )
00065     // Private Windows Timer Data
00066                 LARGE_INTEGER m_performance_counter, m_performance_frequency;
00067                 double m_oneoverfrequency;
00068         #else
00069     // Private UNIX Timer Data
00070                 struct timeval m_timeofday;
00071         #endif
00072 };
00073 
00074 #endif /* TIMER_H_ */
